Get rewarded referral bonus till your friend play upto Rs 5000/-

If you love Eleven11 sports, it is very likely that your Friends are also equally passionate about this game. Funtush11.com offers a very lucrative referral program for it’s player. You earn instant Reward of Rs. 100/- and bonus to play for every cash contest that your friend plays upto Rs. 5000/- per friend.
